alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 11:27PM AKST until December 29 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow, rain, freezing rain, blowing snow and strong winds expected. Travel will be very difficult. Damage to power lines is possible. Additional snow accumulations of 2 inches, and ice accumulations of less than one tenth of an inch, are expected. Wind gusting to 40 mph and visibility less than one half mile at times is expected this afternoon and tonight. * WHERE...Lower Yukon Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and freezing rain will occur today. Southwest winds gusting to 40 mph will cause blowing snow with low visibility from late this afternoon into tonight. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.
